name: Rise and Fall of a Mad Man
name_original: Rise and Fall of a Mad Man
description:
One of the greatest visionaries of the time has disappeared. The only clues to his disappearance are 3 simulations of 3 different worlds he was working on before he vanished. Together with his partner, the player investigates those 3 worlds.

The gameplay is quite simple and consists only of navigating through the three worlds. While the player navigates through the worlds his partner comments on the player's progress and offers interpretations for the intentions of the visionary.
